programme.title: Beyond Limits
programme.desc: Austin treats his wife Daisy with so much hate and disgust, but things are about to change and get worse when Austins younger brother Alex moves into the house.

programme.title: Beauty Not Enough
programme.desc: Ogonna leaves a beautiful family and gets married to beautiful Ifesinachi, little did he know that he just signs his doom.

programme.title: Sister Ada
programme.desc: Ada refuse eight suitors because of Ikenna who sacrificed everything for her. Her family will do everything to make sure the marriage does not work, but what Ada did change everything.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Onochies plans are on the brink of failure. Nnannas plot to get Adanna back fails, and Bianoyerem finds a way to get the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Friendships are put to the test in the light of the latest disruption in Mgberi.

programme.title: Hole In My Heart
programme.desc: In the lead-up to their 10th anniversary, Donald, married to Stella with three daughters, receives constant calls from a secret lover who has his child.

programme.title: Staged
programme.desc: Zainab lied to her friends about getting married, now she has to stage a proper wedding as her Ego is at stake.

programme.title: House Of Trouble
programme.desc: Mama Emeka is deeply frustrated by the constant trouble caused by her children. However, the chaos in the house is about to settle as Emeka has finally exposed.

programme.title: Blood Of An Imbecile
programme.desc: Richard exploited his only brother, Obinna, for money, resulting in a curse that links their fates. Whatever happens to Obinna also happens to Richard.

programme.title: Last Husband
programme.desc: Nonso frustrates every woman that comes into his brothers life, because he fears losing him to them. Now Becky is here to stay but will he let this happen?

programme.title: My Benefit
programme.desc: Osundu is treated with disgust while working with the queen and her princesses, this continues until the princes were ripe to get married and a decision is made.

programme.title: Family War
programme.desc: Ugodiya and Obiageli, rival wives, face a new threat as their children join a dangerous cult. Driven by a thirst for power, they are willing to harm their own family members.

programme.title: Just After Life
programme.desc: Azuka is given the last pebble that will bring a man into her life. He will take care of her, change her life, but will never marry her, because he will not last long.

programme.title: Imperfect Queen
programme.desc: A king is to undergo a royal maiden test to pick a wife, in this seven days, the maidens will live with the king where he will choose the Imperfect queen.

programme.title: Silver Digger
programme.desc: Lydia helps and gives Silver everything and treats her like her sister, but little did Lydia knows that she is about to ruin her home.

programme.title: Original Madam
programme.desc: Oma hides Yadiba from her husband even after their wedding. Now, Jide will go the extra length to frustrate Yadiba and her mother.

programme.title: Beyond Game
programme.desc: April would do anything to become a great sportsman, but her fathers dream of her becoming a doctor is about to get in the way. Is she ready to sacrifice all?

programme.title: DNA
programme.desc: Christiana has issues with her husband Olisa, she dumps Olisa for Ejimofor and also wants Nnamdi her son to belong to Ejimofor. This triggered Olisa and he decides to report to the Gods.

programme.title: Love Me More
programme.desc: Kenneth is a mummys boy who will do everything to please his mummy, this attitude is a time bomb ready to explode as his wife Sandra will do everything to stop the relationship.

programme.title: The Revenge
programme.desc: Peter and Zion were best friends before they travel to Cambodia, hoping for wealth and success to both families, but greed sets in as the families go to war with each other.

programme.title: Benjis Ordeal
programme.desc: Benjis life takes a dangerous turn and he does odd jobs for survival and to keep his kids in school without their knowledge. Little did he know what this decision could cause.

programme.title: Marriage Disappointment
programme.desc: Adanna is accused of charming her sisters so that they do not get married before her, this however did not change anything as every man that comes for Adanna dies mysteriously.

programme.title: The Prince And The Maid
programme.desc: A prince comes back to the palace to be crowned, and interestingly all the maids want him to marry them. The prince is about to make a choice that will shock the entire palace.

programme.title: Style Magnate
programme.desc: Designers must unite to craft a cohesive, Vogue-worthy collection. Will they set aside egos and personal styles for success, or will clashing visions ruin their shot at victory?

programme.title: Game Of Fate
programme.desc: Elena is a workaholic with zero social life and her mother plays a game of fate at a club on her behalf and wins her a date with Danie. He is bent on making her lose everything.

programme.title: Stabbed
programme.desc: Fatima and her child are accused for killing the man who helped and gives them a life , now somebody has to take the fall for a death, will the mother and daughter be saved from the law?

programme.title: Aba Hustlers
programme.desc: Gerald couldnt get a job for 5 years after school. Things are about to change for him as he moves to Aba for a better life, but there are too many hurdles to cross.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Mad House

programme.title: Crazy Kind Of Love

programme.title: In The Dark
programme.desc: Betrayal is the only truth that sticks, a woman becomes a victim of the ultimate betrayal when she invites a friend and her husband into her home. Guess what happened next!

programme.desc: Chikelu the hunter falls in love with a princess, but Egbunike his worst enemy will do everything to make sure that he marries the princess because of his hidden agenda.
